UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: MeuTXKbeta1, a scorpion venom-derived two-domain potassium channel toxin-like peptide with cytolytic activity
Literature.Author: Zhu S, Gao B, Aumelas A, del Carmen Rodríguez M, Lanz-Mendoza H, Peigneur S, Diego-García E, Martin-Eauclaire MF, Tytgat J, Possani LD

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:7% Hemolysis=10 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:17% Hemolysis=20 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Stenotrophomonas sp. YC-1(no activity data),Plasmodium berghei Anka 2.34(70-80% Inhibition=20µM)
